Package org.lwjgl.opengles

Class NVFboColorAttachments

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lwjgl.opengles.NVFboColorAttachments
  • public final class NVFboColorAttachments
extends java.lang.Object
    Native bindings to the NV_fbo_color_attachments extension.

    This extension increases the number of available framebuffer object color attachment points.
